verses.verse: And <WG2532> it came to pass <WG1096>, as <WG1722> he <WG846> went <WG2064> into <WG1519> the house <WG3624> of one <WG5100> of the chief <WG758> Pharisees <WG5330> to eat <WG5315> bread <WG740> on the sabbath <WG4521> day, that <WG2532> they <WG846> watched <WG2258> <WG3906> him <WG846>.
And <WG2532>, behold <WG2400>, there was <WG2258> a certain <WG5100> man <WG444> before <WG1715> him <WG846> which had the dropsy <WG5203>.

And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> answering <WG611> spake <WG2036> unto <WG4314> the lawyers <WG3544> and <WG2532> Pharisees <WG5330>, saying <WG3004>, Is it <WG1487> lawful <WG1832> to heal <WG2323> on the sabbath day <WG4521> ?
And <WG1161> they held their peace <WG2270>. And <WG2532> he took <WG1949> him, and healed <WG2390> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> let him go <WG630>;

And <WG2532> answered <WG611> them <WG4314> <WG846>, saying <WG2036>, Which <WG5101> of you <WG5216> shall have an ass <WG3688> or <WG2228> an ox <WG1016> fallen <WG1706> into <WG1519> a pit <WG5421> , and <WG2532> will <WG385> not <WG3756> straightway <WG2112> pull <WG385> him <WG846> out <WG385> on <WG1722> the sabbath <WG4521> day <WG2250> ?
And <WG2532> they could <WG2480> not <WG3756> answer <WG470> him <WG846> again <WG470> to <WG4314> these things <WG5023>.

¶ And <WG1161> he put forth <WG3004> a parable <WG3850> to <WG4314> those which were bidden <WG2564>, when he marked <WG1907> how <WG4459> they chose out <WG1586> the chief rooms <WG4411>; saying <WG3004> unto <WG4314> them <WG846>,

When <WG3752> thou art bidden <WG2564> of <WG5259> any <WG5100> man to <WG1519> a wedding <WG1062> , sit <WG2625> not <WG3361> down <WG2625> in <WG1519> the highest room <WG4411> ; lest <WG3379> a more honourable man <WG1784> than thou <WG4675> be <WG5600> bidden <WG2564> of <WG5259> him <WG846> ;

And <WG2532> he that bade <WG2564> thee <WG4571> and <WG2532> him <WG846> come <WG2064> and say <WG2046> to thee <WG4671> , Give <WG1325> this man <WG5129> place <WG5117> ; and <WG2532> <WG5119> thou begin <WG756> with <WG3326> shame <WG152> to take <WG2722> the lowest <WG2078> room <WG5117> .

But <WG235> when <WG3752> thou art bidden <WG2564> , go <WG4198> and sit down <WG377> in <WG1519> the lowest <WG2078> room <WG5117> ; that <WG2443> when <WG3752> he that bade <WG2564> thee <WG4571> cometh <WG2064> , he may say <WG2036> unto thee <WG4671> , Friend <WG5384> , go up <WG4320> higher <WG511> : then <WG5119> shalt thou <WG4671> have <WG2071> worship <WG1391> in the presence <WG1799> of them that sit at meat <WG4873> with thee <WG4671> .
For <WG3754> whosoever <WG3956> exalteth <WG5312> himself <WG1438> shall be abased <WG5013> ; and <WG2532> he that humbleth <WG5013> himself <WG1438> shall be exalted <WG5312> .

¶ Then <WG1161> said he <WG3004> also <WG2532> to him that bade <WG2564> him <WG846>, When <WG3752> thou makest <WG4160> a dinner <WG712> or <WG2228> a supper <WG1173> , call <WG5455> not <WG3361> thy <WG4675> friends <WG5384> , nor <WG3366> thy <WG4675> brethren <WG80> , neither <WG3366> thy <WG4675> kinsmen <WG4773> , nor <WG3366> thy rich <WG4145> neighbours <WG1069> ; lest <WG3379> they <WG846> also <WG2532> bid <WG479> thee <WG4571> again <WG479> , and <WG2532> a recompence <WG468> be made <WG1096> thee <WG4671> .
But <WG235> when <WG3752> thou makest <WG4160> a feast <WG1403> , call <WG2564> the poor <WG4434> , the maimed <WG376> , the lame <WG5560> , the blind <WG5185> :

And <WG2532> thou shalt be <WG2071> blessed <WG3107> ; for <WG3754> they cannot <WG3756> <WG2192> recompense <WG467> thee <WG4671> : for <WG1063> thou <WG4671> shalt be recompensed <WG467> at <WG1722> the resurrection <WG386> of the just <WG1342> .

¶ And <WG1161> when one <WG5100> of them that sat at meat with him <WG4873> heard <WG191> these things <WG5023>, he said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, Blessed <WG3107> is he <WG3739> that shall eat <WG5315> bread <WG740> in <WG1722> the kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316>.
Then <WG1161> said he <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, A certain <WG5100> man <WG444> made <WG4160> a great <WG3173> supper <WG1173> , and <WG2532> bade <WG2564> many <WG4183> :

And <WG2532> sent <WG649> his <WG846> servant <WG1401> at supper <WG1173> time <WG5610> to say <WG2036> to them that were bidden <WG2564> , Come <WG2064> ; for <WG3754> all things <WG3956> are <WG2076> now <WG2235> ready <WG2092> .

And <WG2532> they all <WG3956> with <WG575> one <WG3391> consent began <WG756> to make excuse <WG3868> . The first <WG4413> said <WG2036> unto him <WG846> , I have bought <WG59> a piece of ground <WG68> , and <WG2532> I must <WG2192> needs <WG318> go <WG1831> and <WG2532> see <WG1492> it <WG846> : I pray <WG2065> thee <WG4571> have <WG2192> me <WG3165> excused <WG3868> .

And <WG2532> another <WG2087> said <WG2036> , I have bought <WG59> five <WG4002> yoke <WG2201> of oxen <WG1016> , and <WG2532> I go <WG4198> to prove <WG1381> them <WG846> : I pray <WG2065> thee <WG4571> have <WG2192> me <WG3165> excused <WG3868> .
And <WG2532> another <WG2087> said <WG2036> , I have married <WG1060> a wife <WG1135> , and <WG2532> therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> I cannot <WG3756> <WG1410> come <WG2064> .

So <WG2532> that <WG1565> servant <WG1401> came <WG3854> , and shewed <WG518> his <WG846> lord <WG2962> these things <WG5023> . Then <WG5119> the master of the house <WG3617> being angry <WG3710> said <WG2036> to his <WG846> servant <WG1401> , Go out <WG1831> quickly <WG5030> into <WG1519> the streets <WG4113> and <WG2532> lanes <WG4505> of the city <WG4172> , and <WG2532> bring in <WG1521> hither <WG5602> the poor <WG4434> , and <WG2532> the maimed <WG376> , and <WG2532> the halt <WG5560> , and <WG2532> the blind <WG5185> .
And <WG2532> the servant <WG1401> said <WG2036> , Lord <WG2962> , it is done <WG1096> as <WG5613> thou hast commanded <WG2004> , and <WG2532> yet <WG2089> there is <WG2076> room <WG5117> .

And <WG2532> the lord <WG2962> said <WG2036> unto <WG4314> the servant <WG1401> , Go out <WG1831> into <WG1519> the highways <WG3598> and <WG2532> hedges <WG5418> , and <WG2532> compel <WG315> them to come in <WG1525> , that <WG2443> my <WG3450> house <WG3624> may be filled <WG1072> .
For <WG1063> I say <WG3004> unto you <WG5213> , That <WG3754> none <WG3762> of those <WG1565> men <WG435> which <WG3588> were bidden <WG2564> shall taste <WG1089> of my <WG3450> supper <WG1173> .
¶ And <WG1161> there went <WG4848> great <WG4183> multitudes <WG3793> with him <WG846>: and <WG2532> he turned <WG4762>, and said <WG2036> unto <WG4314> them <WG846>,

If any <WG1536> man come <WG2064> to <WG4314> me <WG3165> , and <WG2532> hate <WG3404> not <WG3756> his <WG1438> father <WG3962> , and <WG2532> mother <WG3384> , and <WG2532> wife <WG1135> , and <WG2532> children <WG5043> , and <WG2532> brethren <WG80> , and <WG2532> sisters <WG79> , yea <WG2089> , and <WG1161> his own <WG1438> life <WG5590> also <WG2532> , he cannot <WG3756> <WG1410> be <WG1511> my <WG3450> disciple <WG3101> .

And <WG2532> whosoever <WG3748> doth <WG941> not <WG3756> bear <WG941> his <WG846> cross <WG4716> , and <WG2532> come <WG2064> after <WG3694> me <WG3450> , cannot <WG3756> <WG1410> be <WG1511> my <WG3450> disciple <WG3101> .

For <WG1063> which <WG5101> of <WG1537> you <WG5216> , intending <WG2309> to build <WG3618> a tower <WG4444> , sitteth <WG2523> not <WG3780> down <WG2523> first <WG4412> , and counteth <WG5585> the cost <WG1160> , whether <WG1487> he have <WG2192> sufficient to <WG4314> finish <WG535> it ?

Lest <WG3363> haply <WG3379> , after he <WG846> hath laid <WG5087> the foundation <WG2310> , and <WG2532> is <WG2480> not <WG3361> able <WG2480> to finish <WG1615> it , all <WG3956> that behold <WG2334> it begin <WG756> to mock <WG1702> him <WG846> ,
Saying <WG3004> , This <WG3754> <WG3778> man <WG444> began <WG756> to build <WG3618> , and <WG2532> was <WG2480> not <WG3756> able <WG2480> to finish <WG1615> .

Or <WG2228> what <WG5101> king <WG935> , going <WG4198> to make <WG4820> war <WG4171> against <WG1519> another <WG2087> king <WG935> , sitteth <WG2523> not <WG3780> down <WG2523> first <WG4412> , and consulteth <WG1011> whether <WG1487> he be <WG2076> able <WG1415> with <WG1722> ten <WG1176> thousand <WG5505> to meet <WG528> him that cometh <WG2064> against <WG1909> him <WG846> with <WG3326> twenty <WG1501> thousand <WG5505> ?
Or else <WG1490> , while the other <WG846> is <WG5607> yet <WG2089> a great way off <WG4206> , he sendeth <WG649> an ambassage <WG4242> , and desireth <WG2065> conditions <WG4314> of peace <WG1515> .

So <WG3779> likewise <WG3767> , whosoever <WG3956> he be of <WG1537> you <WG5216> that <WG3739> forsaketh <WG657> not <WG3756> all <WG3956> that he hath <WG5224> <WG1438> , he cannot <WG3756> <WG1410> be <WG1511> my <WG3450> disciple <WG3101> .
¶ Salt <WG217> is good <WG2570> : but <WG1161> if <WG1437> the salt <WG217> have lost his savour <WG3471> , wherewith <WG1722> <WG5101> shall it be seasoned <WG741> ?

It is <WG2076> neither <WG3777> fit <WG2111> for <WG1519> the land <WG1093> , nor yet <WG3777> for <WG1519> the dunghill <WG2874> ; but men cast <WG906> it <WG846> out <WG1854> . He that hath <WG2192> ears <WG3775> to hear <WG191> , let him hear <WG191> .
